Uses of Package
com.cloudera.oryx.als.common

  • Packages that use com.cloudera.oryx.als.common 
    Package Description
    com.cloudera.oryx.als.common  
  • Classes in com.cloudera.oryx.als.common used by com.cloudera.oryx.als.common 
    Class and Description
    IDValue
    Simply encapsulates and ID and value.
    NoSuchItemException
    Thrown when a method in classes like OryxRecommender can't complete because it is trying to operate on an item whose ID is not known.
    NoSuchUserException
    Thrown when a method in classes like OryxRecommender can't complete because it is trying to operate on a user whose ID is not known.
    NotReadyException
    Thrown when a component is not ready to answer a request yet.
    NumericIDValue
    Simply encapsulates and ID and value.
    PairRescorer
    Like Rescorer, but operates on pairs of item IDs, not single item IDs.
    Rescorer
    Implementations of this interface can "rescore" the recommender's score for a item that is a candidate for recommendation.
